definition: not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
one and only (idiom); rarely seen/unique of its kind
only remaining of the great (idiom); one of the few greats extant
that's all/just this and nothing more

sentences.english: All patients recovered after operation except 1 case died of diabetes insipidus.
sentences.chinese: 絕大多數患者手術後恢復良好，僅1例死於尿崩症。

sentences.english: Above term only apply to dorsa above3,000 bales.
sentences.chinese: 以上條件，僅適用於三千捆以上的訂單。

sentences.english: In this example we maintain only one copy of the data.
sentences.chinese: 在這個例子中，我們僅維護數據的一個副本。

sentences.english: One day is hardly enough to show our gratitude。
sentences.chinese: 僅這一天遠不足以表達我們對您的感激之情。

sentences.english: Racial feats are available only to characters of a specific race.
sentences.chinese: 種族專長僅適用於人物的特定種族。

sentences.english: I want to go there, can you take with me?
sentences.chinese: 僅這個夢想，我花盡了心思。

sentences.english: It's only about three feet wide.
Currently only Jordan's king has that right.
sentences.chinese: 目前僅約旦國王有任命首相的權力。

sentences.english: In one such experiment he took 24, 576 measurements.
sentences.chinese: 僅這一個實驗他就測量了24576次。

sentences.english: Remember that these conversions are for display only.
sentences.chinese: 記住這些轉換僅用於顯示。

sentences.english: Westpac Bank has recovered all but NZ$3.8 million.
sentences.chinese: 西太平洋銀行僅挽回了380萬新西蘭元的損失。

sentences.english: You only run these segments when you call the function.
sentences.chinese: 在您調用函數時，僅運行相應的片斷。

sentences.english: Moreover, the quick example only shows how to poll one time.
sentences.chinese: 此外，本文的示例僅展示瞭如何進行單次輪詢。

sentences.english: Flea markets came into being in China only several years ago.
sentences.chinese: 僅幾年前中國纔開始有了跳蚤市場。

sentences.english: For the content of Fe element, the most varieties are well-balanced and only 'Huanghua' is in the low bound.
sentences.chinese: 各品種鐵素含量較正常，僅黃花梨含量處於低量範圍。

sentences.english: A baby cries and gurgles but does not use articulate speech .
sentences.chinese: 嬰兒僅啼哭和咯咯作聲，卻無法清晰的發音。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
